review.reviewBody: I tasted bitterness from the chicken sandwich, the lettuce did not taste fresh.
Tastes good, so I ordered it two days in a row and on the second day the burger had become at least 1/3 smaller than when I ordered the first time. Dishonest business.
The mango coconut was really bad. Smelled worse.

Garlic vegetablesnothing but bok choy and light oily garlic sauce for $17.00. aRegsrdjes of inflation that is nuts .  The price would be okay if there were some more assorted veggies like zucchini onion celery yes veggies ridiculously expensive 

The other items ribs pork noodle and lamb all very good to fair butvthecvrgguecdushvwas a complete rip off sorry,
